content.html: (software engineering people) Are you able to search all your organization's source code readily? (cloning all the repos and grepping them counts, not asking about fancy tools.)
content.value:
(software engineering people) Are you able to search all your organization's source code readily?

(cloning all the repos and grepping them counts, not asking about fancy tools.)

content.html: Funny story: the conspiracy theory on Blind that I did not code anything at Apple came from the fact that every repository I worked on was only accessible to my team or my team and Global Security. Access control at Apple is in every part of the company. Siloing & secrecy is #1.
content.value:
Funny story: the conspiracy theory on Blind that I did not code anything at Apple came from the fact that every repository I worked on was only accessible to my team or my team and Global Security.

Access control at Apple is in every part of the company. Siloing & secrecy is #1.
